about.description:
The HDX Python API Library is designed to enable you to easily develop code
that interacts with the Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) platform. The
major goal of the library is to make pushing and pulling data from HDX as
simple as possible for the end user.
about.summary: Python API for interacting with the HDX Data Porta

about.description:
The HDX Python API Library is designed to enable you to easily develop code
that interacts with the Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) platform. The
major goal of the library is to make pushing and pulling data from HDX as
simple as possible for the end user.
about.summary: Python API for interacting with the HDX Data Porta

name: hdx-python-api
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "hdx-python-api" %}
{% set version = "6.0.6" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name.replace('-', '_') }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 2df47531daa890fd821f562cab10666c15a0cd9204f2b1b122632aeade1c0e74

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.8
    - pip
    - hatchling
    - hatch-vcs
  run:
    - python >=3.8
    - ckanapi >=4.7
    - defopt >=6.4.0
    - email_validator
    - hdx-python-country >=3.5.1
    - makefun
    - ndg-httpsclient
    - pyasn1
    - pyopenssl
    - quantulum3

test:
  imports:
    - hdx.api.configuration
    - hdx.api.locations
    - hdx.data.dataset
  requires:
    - pip
  commands:
    - pip check

about:
  home: http://data.humdata.org
  summary: Python API for interacting with the HDX Data Porta
  description: |
    The HDX Python API Library is designed to enable you to easily develop code
    that interacts with the Humanitarian Data Exchange (HDX) platform. The
    major goal of the library is to make pushing and pulling data from HDX as
    simple as possible for the end user.
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  doc_url: https://hdx-python-api.readthedocs.io
  dev_url: https://github.com/OCHA-DAP/hdx-python-api

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - kynan
    - mcarans
